short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable this Chrome extension to watch videos in a small, movable window on their screen while accessing other apps.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Having trouble juggling watching YouTube TV and doing other stuff on your computer? üíªüì∫ Install the Picture-in-Picture (PiP) for YouTube TV chrome extension üåêüõ†Ô∏è. It allows you to watch YouTube videos in a small window that stays on top while you do other things on your computer, like browsing the internet or working on documents üåçüìÑ. 
This means you can watch your favorite shows and videos without having to switch between tasks, making everything you do on your computer a bit easier üòäüëç.

Key feature of PiP for youtube tv chrome extension

Floating Video Window: Enables a video to be played in a floating window that can be moved and resized.
Advanced PiP Mode: Offers functionality beyond the native PiP mode, such as working on tabs outside YouTube, checking comments, and customizable window size.
One-Click Activation: Once set up, activating the PiP mode is simple and quick.
Integration with YouTube as an App: The extension can make YouTube function like a floating app on your desktop.
Customizable Shortcuts: Allows the setting of custom shortcut keys for easy control and navigation.
Minimize to Listen: Users can minimize the video and continue listening to it, reducing distractions while multitasking.

How to use:

Start by opening the Chrome Web Store in your browser.
Search for "PiP for YouTube TV Chrome Extension" using the store's search functionality.
Click on the extension from the search results and select 'Add to Chrome' to install.
Once installed, go to YouTube TV and play your preferred video.
While the video is playing, click on the newly added extension icon in your browser.
The extension enables a small video window, allowing you to continue watching while accessing other apps or websites in a seamless manner.
This method provides a convenient way to watch YouTube TV content while multitasking, all through a simple and user-friendly extension.
